text:
works only one time on a web page for php scripts. (and only php scripts, others no problem) example: script.php: echo "World!"; body of test.html (with xbithack on and file mode 755): Hello
Nice to meet you...
Bye Output: Hello World! Nice to meet you... Bye (The second 'world' is missing.)

You'll need to upgrade to the latest php, and be sure to use the apache_handler
sapi and not the apache_filter one.  You should also upgrade apache if you
want to file bug reports, since we can't debug issues in versions that are
several releases old.
